context: Hi. Can you please recommend me a good dance movie. Step Up (2006) and Dirty Dancing: Havana Nights are absolutely my favorite. I enjoyed Dirty Dancing too Did you like them?
Im not too familiar with dance movies but i did enjoy Honey (2003) and O (2001) i havent seen any of those movies
I liked Honey (2003) , but I didn't like O (2001) . I found it too boring
I understand O (2001) was a slow movie
They also made Honey (2010) it wasnt as good as the first but it was okay
Really? I didn't even know about it. I think I have to watch Honey (2010) .
I also loved Black Swan (2010) . The movie is absolutely amazing Thanks. You too
resp: I Loved Black Swan (2010) totally forgot about that
